alert.note: Alert for Caruthers - San Joaquin - Selma; Fresno-Clovis; Hanford - Corcoran - Lemoore; Los Banos - Dos Palos; Merced - Madera - Mendota; Planada - Le Grand - Snelling; Visalia - Porterville - Reedley; West Side of Fresno and Kings Counties (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 14 at 1:19PM PST until January 15 at 11:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 11 AM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Visibility less than one quarter mile in dense fog, with areas as low as 200 feet. * WHERE...San Joaquin Valley north of Kern County * WHEN...From 1 AM to 11 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Low visibility will make driving conditions hazardous. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highways impacted include Highways 99, 198, 180, 168, 152, 140, 43, and 41. Portions of Interstate 5 could also see patches of dense fog.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your low beam headlights, and leave plenty of distance between you and the vehicle in front of you. Plan to leave early and allow extra time to reach your destination.
